description.value: As a reaction to taking damage that matches your Elemental Affinity's type, you can spend your @Compendium[undertaking.abilities.65D4NMYRBMKHW59K]{🕯 Faith} Dice to heal yourself for the total faith roll plus your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability even if the initial damage was reduced to 0, for example as a result of resistance or immunity.
